name: sky-nails
description: - Cd to repo's folder - Run `docker build -t sky-nails .` - To run the image, run command: `docker run -d -p 80:80 sky-nails` # Push: Run these commands: ``` docker login -u <username> -p <password> docker tag sky-nails:latest henrylee777/sky_nails:latest docker push henrylee777/sky_nails:latest ```
